name: Snowman Escape
description: In the snowy town of Winter Frost, you’ll find children building snowmen like Marty in their free time. Ricky loves to push the snowmen over. The snowmen must also avoid The Sun, which is hot enough to melt snow. If you can get Marty to the woods, he'll be shaded from The Sun and Ricky's mom does not let Ricky go into the woods. Get to score 1,000 and Marty is saved!
